thread.section_title: TackleDirect Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TackleDirect | www.tackledirect.com | 4 of 118
thread.title: Don

author: Don
title: Don
text:
I am new to saltwater sport fishing, but received instructive advice on great products which were procured at an exceptional price. Really enjoyed speaking with a friendly voice who provided guidance on the best lines to spool the reels for my trolling for Dorado.
Based on the shopping experience, I will certainly return to Tackle Direct for future fishing needs. Additionally, I will strongly recommend Tackle Direct to others.
